alert.note: Alert for Greene; Oglethorpe; Taliaferro; Warren; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Warren, northeastern Greene, Taliaferro, southern Wilkes and south central Oglethorpe Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Robinson to near Norwood, and moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Washington, Crawfordville, Rayle, Sharon, Ficklin, Cadley, Lundberg, Robinson, Daniel Springs, Aonia, Rocky Creek Fire Dept., Lyneville, Raytown, Philomath, Alexander Stephens Park, Sandy Cross and Carters Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
